sentences.en: Already the hospitals were worrying about the scarcity of quinine, calomel, opium, chloroform and iodine.
sentences.cn: 各个医院已经在为缺乏奎宁 、 甘汞 、 鸦片 、 哥罗仿、碘酒等等而发愁.

sentences.en: Apply some iodine before you bandage.
sentences.cn: 用绷带包扎伤口之前先敷点碘酒。

sentences.en: In medicament industry, iodine has huge effect for antisepsis and antisepticise.
sentences.cn: 在医药中, 碘具有很大的消毒、防腐作用.

sentences.en: In our sample, iodine atoms occupied only one - third of the possible iodine - attachment sites.
sentences.cn: 在我们所用的试样上, 碘原子所占的地方只有可以连接碘原子的地方的 三分之一.

sentences.en: In the intestine, free iodine or iodate undergoes reduction to iodide before absorption.
sentences.cn: 在肠内被吸收以前游离碘或碘酸盐还原成碘化物.

sentences.en: Iodine smarts when it is put on a cut.
sentences.cn: 碘酒涂在伤口上真杀得慌.

sentences.en: Iodine tends to localize in the thyroid.
Lack of iodine is a common cause of trouble.
sentences.cn: 缺碘是造成麻烦的常见原因.

sentences.en: She dabbed iodine on the cuts on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她把碘酒轻搽在前额的伤口上。

sentences.en: Since radioactive iodine decays rapidly, virtually all radiation ceases within a few weeks.
sentences.cn: 由于放射性碘能迅速破坏, 因而实际上几星期内放射性就全部结束了.

sentences.en: Some sea animals accumulate elements like vanadium and iodine within their cells.
sentences.cn: 某些海洋动物在其细胞内积累象钒和碘一类元素.

sentences.en: Starch yields a blue color in the presence of iodine.
sentences.cn: 有磺存在时,淀粉即呈蓝色.

sentences.en: The cut burns from the iodine.
sentences.cn: 伤口因涂了碘酒而疼痛。

sentences.en: The doctor painted iodine on the cut.
sentences.cn: 医生在伤口上涂点碘酒.

sentences.en: The nurse bathed his wound with iodine.
sentences.cn: 护士在他的伤口上涂碘酒.

sentences.en: The sheet is then dipped into an ink solution rich in iodine.
sentences.cn: 然后把片子浸入含有很多碘的墨水中.

sentences.en: The tincture of iodine smarted when applied it to the wound.
sentences.cn: 往伤口上擦碘酒时，能引起剧痛。

sentences.en: You must have lots of iodine.

phrases.tran_cn: [化]聚维酮碘；[化]聚乙烯吡咯酮碘

trans.tran_en: a dark blue chemical substance that is used on wounds to prevent infection. It is a chemical  element  :symbol I
